column4: If im on a ftpserver and wants to change my local directory, isnt it !cd "path" ?!
I don't know.  I always end up disconnecting,  changing directory and then reconnecting.  A real pain but... that is what I do. :(
Ahhh.. That can't be true, there must be a way.
I didn't say it couldn't be done.  I said I don't know how.
